name: Shooter Obstacle
description:
Shooter Obstacle is a simple 3D Runner Shooter game that player should run on each platform before the current platform disappear and shooting all the enemies that always spawn on the platform and player will get the high score while playing the game.

How to play?
  • W A S D to move.
  • Space to jump.
  • Left Click to shoot.

Platform:

  • Windows PC
  • Android   

Icon Provided by:

  • Icon - https://www.flaticon.com/
